name: Course Area Task Management
description: Task planning and management system for courses and areas with flexible categorization

prd.problem: Course maintenance tasks need to be organized by specific areas of the course, but there's no structured way to define, categorize, and manage these area-specific tasks with their requirements and characteristics.
prd.solution: Build a comprehensive task management system that allows creation of tasks tied to specific course areas, with details on what needs to be done, equipment needed, skill requirements, and estimated completion time.
successCriteria: Tasks can be created and assigned to specific course areas
Task definitions include equipment, skills, and time estimates
Tasks can be filtered and viewed by area
Task library can be reused across scheduling periods
assumptions: Course areas are already defined in the system
